name: a berserker potion
effect: swigs the potion that tastes mysteriously like piss... their eyes turn red as they let out a terrifying roar!
+20dmg and +15% bonus crit chance on the next fight/monsterhunt!
descr: this potion might taste like the piss of a person who is severely dehydrated... - 20 bonus damage and +15% critical chance for your next monsterhunt or bar brawl

name: a sixpack of red bull
effect: cracks open all six cans of red bull and pours it into a funnel stuck in his throat... maximum refreshment!
+10dmg on the next fight/monsterhunt!
descr: if one red bull gives you wings... what will a sixpack do - give me orbital rocket thrusters? - 10 bonus damage for your next monsterhunt or bar brawl

name: three lessons in karate
effect: goes to his local dojo and introduces himself to the karate weebs... then starts punching air in front of a mirror while screaming in japanese!
+30dmg for the next /monsterhunt!
descr: just three lessons might sound like too few... listen - the confidence boost and the intimidation factor comes into play when your enemy thinks you are a black belt! - 30 bonus damage for your next /monsterhunt

name: a jar of badger piss
effect: furiously unscrews the jar of sweet, sweet badger piss and showers it all over their face and chest... a feeling of focus and clarity washes their mind!
+10% crit chance on the next fight/monsterhunt!
descr: this is a good batch... you can tell by the muddy gelatinous texture. - 10% bonus crit chance for your next monsterhunt or bar brawl

name: a bad reputation
effect: starts smacktalking and backtalking and shittalking the muddafuckin shit outta this bitchfaced asshole called
got an instant -100 XP!
descr: you know where and how to spread rumors that effectively but temporarily fuck with someone - target user instantly loses 100 XP

name: the blood of Passport
effect: pours passports special needs blood into a sippy cup and enjoys it thoroughly!
DOUBLE XP next time you claim /dailyxp!
descr: ahhh... there is nothing like the taste of the blood of Passport - you gain double XP next time you do /dailyxp

name: a fresh pair of undies
effect: slides out of their damp shit-caked undies and puts on a brand new pair!
ahh such a quality of life upgrade - instant +150XP!
descr: lets be real and appreciate how great unsoiled underwear is... - you instantly gain +100xp

name: some nookie
effect: walks down the street and happens upon some nookie!
instant +69XP - nice.
descr: oh, you dirty badger! you got your paws on some nookie from a lucky someone! - you instantly gain +69xp

name: 15mins of fame
effect: got their time in the limelight but now it's over... exhilirating while it lasted but now that feeling is replaced by emptiness and disillusionment
instant +50XP at least so you got that going for ya
descr: for a limited time you thought you had it all, that you were doing something right with your life... but then someone pulled the red rug from underneath your feet - you instantly gain +50xp

name: a decent psyop
effect: performs a not-too-shabby psyop on
got all of their active consumable items removed!!
descr: this psyop is a decent one because it works for like 5minutes - but sometimes that is all the time you need in the world to get what you want! - you dispel all active effects on target user (for example berserker potion or blood of Passport)

name: a gaslight
effect: puts a pink lighter by his butthole and rips a fart right in the face of
instantly loses 50 XP!
descr: gaslighting is the cheapest, most annoying shit ever... so only target someone you dont like! - target user instantly loses 50XP

name: the extra lives of a street cat
effect: just found some street cats who conveniently had extra lives to spare... so you help yourself to some!
you are INVULNERABLE for the next monsterhunt/fight
descr: it's good to have a couple extra lives in your backpocket in case shit happens y'know! - invulnerability for next fight/monsterhunt

name: delirium tremens
effect: hides all the alcoholic beverages, inducing serious delirium tremens in
starts shaking and sweating as a deep seated anxiety bubbles up... they get -15dmg for the next monsterhunt/fight
descr: if you are an alcoholic and you stop cold turkey, very very bad things can happen! - target user gets -15dmg for their next fight/monsterhunt

name: employment as a mcdonalds cashier
effect: got a callback from the mcdonalds job he applied to and is now working the night shift taking drive-thru orders
feels safe knowing that no matter how bad things get, they can always get+25xp by working at mickey d's
descr: what can you say - employment at mcdonalds is like the capitalist version of a safety net! - you instantly gain +25 XP

name: a can of jai alai india pale ale
effect: cracks a can of the most satisfying beverage known to man... time to get fucked up with style
they get an INSTANT +250xp
descr: the sweet nectar of life that gets you drunk and makes stuff funny and makes life enjoyable for a hot second - you instantly gain +250 XP!!!

name: an m3 bradley battletank
effect: gathers his crew of strong 19 year old marines and hops in a FUCKING ARMORED TANK, BOIII WTF
they are INVULNERABLE and gets +25dmg for the next monsterhunt/fight
descr: it's a frickin armor plated battletank with a fat cannon and a crew of battle hardened marines! - frickin' invulnerability & you get +25damage for next fight/monsterhunt

name: a supersoaker filled with piss
effect: pumps their super soaker and shoots a lukewarm stream of deep yellow piss all over
is fuckin drenched and gets an INSTANT -150XP!
descr: pump it up & aim... to give a special someone a golden shower - target user instantly lose -150xp

name: a pair of googly eyes
effect: slaps on a pair of googly eyes on their dumb forehead to make the enemy underestimate them
they get a bonus +5% chance for a critical hit for the next /monsterhunt!
descr: every enemy that looks at you will underestimate you when you got a pair of googly eyes on your forehead, LFG! - 5% bonus critical chance for the next /monsterhunt

name: withdrawals from hard drugs
effect: hides the drugs in a super secret location and inducing withdrawals in
gets -20dmg for their next fight/monsterhunt!
descr: stash the hard drugs somewhere where they cant find em to induce serious, potentially lifethreatening withdrawals! - target user gets -20damage for next fight/monsterhunt
